functions.name: flanneld_file_ownership_check
functions.description: Checks file ownership for flanneld CNI configuration.

notes: All functions are based on Kubernetes FLANNELD API.
Ensure proper RBAC permissions are configured.
Flannel is a container networking interface.
Network configuration and security are key aspects.
Performance optimization and monitoring are important.
Implement appropriate retry logic for API calls.
Use Kubernetes client libraries for API interactions.
